Name: Strip 'Em
About the game: Announcing Strip 'Em II: Facka's Game Please consider adding it to your wishlist, it really helps! / Strip 'Em is not just a poker game, it's a Fuck 'Em poker game, one where you get sexy ladies to play with you and, should you win, strip for you and even more. Full game features: - Over 800 sexy or full of sexual content images !!! - 5 female characters , with the framework to add even more at a later date. - Story Mode : Preset matches that follow a story. Will you be a champion and fuck them all or will you be humiliated by the best female amateur poker players? - Freestyle Mode : This gives you the option to play against any of the ladies, play against one or four at the same time. - A nice, relaxing audio atmosphere. This can be controlled from the Options Menu. - A very nice Texas Hold'Em poker mechanic. We really hope you enjoy this, the coder spent a lot of time on this! Including different Poker Limit Rules, Tournament or Cash Game and optional use of a short card deck. - Difficulty modes: You can either win very easily or play hard!
